contents.text: Thank you for calling HelloSign in San Francisco, the most powerful platform for your business agreements.
For help sending, signing, or managing your agreements, press 1.
For guidance on preparing and e-signing your documents, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a document preparation specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help preparing and e-signing an agreement quickly.
I need help preparing and e-signing my VA benefits application form.
I need to embed form fields in my PDF agreement and finalize the e-signature workflow.
I need someone to guide me through uploading and electronically signing my will.
I need assistance preparing and sending a physics collaboration agreement for e-signature.

contents.text: For information on API integration and developer support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our API support team.

navigationGoals: I need support integrating HelloSign’s API into our app.
I want to integrate HelloSign’s API into my veteran community website to automate volunteer consent forms.
I need help authenticating with the HelloSign SDK and automating signature requests via the API.
I need help integrating HelloSign’s API with my small business website for automatic form signing.
I want to integrate HelloSign’s API into my lab management software for automated signature workflows.

contents.text: For billing, pricing, or subscription questions, press 2.
To manage your subscription and billing options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to update my subscription plan and billing information.
I want to upgrade my subscription plan to handle more document transactions for my veteran support program.
I want to switch from a monthly to an annual plan and update my billing information.
I’d like to update my payment method and change my subscription plan.
I need to review and adjust my HelloSign subscription for academic use.

contents.text: For assistance with account settings and user access, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account support team.

navigationGoals: I need to manage user access and settings on my account.
I need to add a team member to my account and set their user permissions.
I need to configure SAML SSO and assign granular user roles for my team account.
I need assistance resetting my account password and setting up user access for my assistant.
I need help managing user access and roles on my HelloSign account.
